nodes.title: Add prettier and style all files
Bumped NumberPickerView library version to fix initialization bug on hour wheel.
[Android] Date order is wrong according to the locale's preference
Custom width and height + Layout improvements
Fix DayWheel interval forming when either maximumDate or minimumDate prop is missing
Add Korean(ko) day format for DayWheel
Support picking dates in different centuries
Fix for timezone bug in android picker
align 'mode' examples for ios android in README
Bugfix: Crashes on date mode for some locales.
Rename project to new package name.
Add podspec for cocoapods support on iOS
fix: setTextColor should always run on superclass
chore: make date prop required in typescript + move d.ts file to root
fix: talkback read display value on scroll value change
Fix: Two-finger scroll issue when TalkBack is active
fix: native variant text color fix for Android 10 (sdk 29)
chore: migrate to jitpack for android dependencies
Feature - Add accessibility support for android date picker
fix: android native variant stops responding at unmount during spinn
fix: bugs occurring on daylight saving day
fix: android native variant min/max scrolling issues
Bugfix: Scroll away from invalid dates
[android]fix:"DatePickerManager" was not found in the UIManager
fix android compilation issues below sdk 26
Fix nynorsk (nn) locale by adding it to Formats
bugfix: onDateChange not called on tap for androidNative variant
fix picker width and wheel spacing
fix datetime order pattern for vi-vn locale
ios 14 fix: set wheels as preferred date picker style
bugfix: scrolls beyond min/max date not always triggering onChange
Specify the default value for androidVariant prop
Fix android native wheel stop glitch 2
Bugfix: Prevent NullpointerException for some languages
Change default date format for Finnish
Fix return of wrong pattern piece
fix  bug when language is Chinese or Japanese in Android
pickerview android display text size changed from sp to dp.
Bugfix: Too many words in day label for some locales
Bugfix: onDateChange not called for some locales
Bugfix: iOS minute interval not working in time mode
Add suggestion to try other library for non-date wheel picker
Bugfix: Text color on iOS 13 not displayed properly
Re-add prop-types. Remove unsupported ios props.
